data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 514,700 people living in Davao Oriental.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Davao Oriental, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 71,697 believers in the state of Davao Oriental into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.section_summary: On average, 105 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Davao Oriental, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Davao Oriental to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, help the 71,697 believers find a person of peace today among the 443,004 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kalagan people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, make the 396,502 people in the state of Davao Oriental who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Davao Oriental, Philippines to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Davao Oriental, Philippines to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
